title: Wanted: T206 Danny Murphy American Beauty
author: Sailingmachine

posts.post_title: Wanted: T206 Danny Murphy American Beauty
posts.post_content:
Still searching for a Danny Murphy American Beauty back. Interested in any condition raw or graded.

Thanks in advance. 

Ron

Bump........Desperately seeking AB Murphy. I'm working on a back run and the AB is the last realistically obtainable back for me. Please contact me if you have one or know of someone who may have one available. Condition is irrelevant at this point, will look at any and all that are available. Thanks

Ron
They can be a lot harder to find than you think. You might want to buckle up. It could be a long ride.

Ron,

holy hell is that an impressive run on a tough card as well! I hope you can keep this going and update this thread when you make more progress. This is one of my favorite cards in the set. Good luck!

Josh

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1630501]Ron,

holy hell is that an impressive run on a tough card as well! I hope you can keep this going and update this thread when you make more progress. This is one of my favorite cards in the set. Good luck!

Josh[/QUOTE]

Josh, thanks. I'm actually doing the back run for the batting pose and completed the run for the throwing pose. Throwing was much easier not having any super tough backs. I'm doing the 205 back run for Murph as well, having a cough time with getting a checklist for Murphy/back combos. I have both m116 backs for him, m101 backs. For colgan chips I'm just missing the tin top. I have both 14 and 15 CJs also working on any and all of his E series and their backs (not a priority). Im at 70 different Murphy issue/ back combinations/ variations with numerous other dupes. I'm after any Murphy issue that's available. I will keep this thread updated though. Thanks for your interest.

Ron

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1630447]They can be a lot harder to find than you think. You might want to buckle up. It could be a long ride.[/QUOTE]

Phillip,
Yea, finding the AB to be a real pain to locate. As you can see with what I have left why I say it's the last realistic one for me to obtain at this point. I think it will be a long ride though.
